website_summaries.verdict: High-quality batting tee that gives older players the durability they need for practice.
pros: Hand-rolled design ball rest is designed perfectly to allow for maximum contact with the ball
Use with either baseballs or softballs
Easy to make height adjustments for all ages of players
Shrinks down to a small size for portability
cons: A higher price point than you'll want for young players

customer_reviews.title: This is easily the best tee
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on any other tee. My son has played top level baseball for years and EVERYONE use Tanner tees. All the Florida high schools and the top level baseball academies use Tanner tees! Why? QUALITY! When my son was younger I spent money on many, many, cheaper tees....all were garbage and didn’t last. This company has become the leader without any advertising...it’s all by word of mouth, and by experience! These things can take a beating over and over. Picture 60 kids a day taking hacks at a tee and its still good for years! These things last and last!
customer_reviews.author: Sar

customer_reviews.title: This one is hands down the best tee we've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this tee when my son was just starting baseball. We've probably purchased 6-7 tee's over the years. This one is hands down the best tee we've ever used. We've used this all season with our 10U baseball team. It's taken a pretty good beating but shows no signs of wear. Great design that I anticipate will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Drak

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Seriously awesome quality. A coach friend told me this was better than the ones that he had for his team at school. There are worries that it may 'accidentally' end up in his trunk. Lol! I would recommend this. Why buy 5 or 6 cheaper ones when you can buy this one and not have to replace it?
customer_reviews.author: The Pod

customer_reviews.title: light-weight yet durable
customer_reviews.text: Our 11yo loves his new Tee. He can adjust it easily as well as carry to and from garage to backyard for his own private batting session. It doesn't knock over due to the cone design and material of the top.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystee A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Best tee I've used bar none
customer_reviews.text: Been using this tee regularly (several times a week) since getting it at the beginning of 2018. Both my son (baseball) and I (softball) have been using it as well as using it when I coach his baseball team. Has shown zero sign of fatigue where the typical "tee" would have had the rubber tee insert split by now. Further, due to the design, batter gets much better feedback on striking the ball and contact applied.
customer_reviews.author: thesmalls

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing! Love at 1st sight
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy.. good quality materials.... easy to transport.... Love at first try! I carry it in my baseball training backpack with a dozen of balls and the materials are so high quality that you I can easily screw in the stem into the base without being worried about messing with the threads.. and comes back out easily when Im done...! also to set up or down during training is so easy, you don't need to interrupt your rhythm for minutes taking stuff out and moving it... just set the desired high and voila! ...
customer_reviews.author: Wander

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE and only one...
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for the perfect tee. I was hesitant, at first, because it isn't cheap. However, that being said, it is worth every penny. I anticipate this will last us for MANY MANY years to come. I would rather purchase one expensive tee than to have to replace a cheaper one over and over again. You get way you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Improving my game!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I waited so long to buy a hitting tee, but it's the best thing for improving my game. The Tanner Tee is very portable, sturdy, and pretty darn simple. I hit yesterday in a brisk wind and not one time did the ball fall off the tee. I've only used this tee a few times so I can't evaluate the longevity of the tee, but it is very well constructed. We live in Arizona so I will make sure to keep this inside the house so the rubber tip doesn't fall apart from the extreme heat. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lowelife

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Great tee... I don't know why I waited so long to buy one!(well I do, cause I'm cheap and already had a rubber tee). This tee is so much better, you don't feel the tee when making contact with the balls giving you a more realistic feel. Also this tee comes apart easily for transport to and from tournaments. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CoastalBackwoods

customer_reviews.title: Tee-rific
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft rubber at the top 8". If the batter swings under the ball, he/she is not hitting a stiff black tube like the cheaper tees and thus won't knock over the whole tee itself. Instead, the soft rubber just lets the bat go under the ball and the ball falls straight down. Quality made with a metal bottom half of the tee post. It also raises and lowers super easy; my 9 year old can do it no problem. Overall.... really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eureka

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee - Lives up to its Name
customer_reviews.text: After going through a few cheaper Tees, I dug into the history and reviews on this Tee and I am glad I went with this brand. The stand is very durable and has a wide adjustable range. The base is heavy enough to give you some leeway on knocking it over if you don't hit perfectly. It's still light enough for my kids to move it around easily so I'm not always be called to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our 18U softball team to replace an off the shelf tee. The girls commented how much better they like it. The ball stays on the Tee better than the other and has good stability. We've only had it for a few weeks, but the initial reviews are great. Easy to assemble and light enough to take from tournament to tournament.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Banzer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: After trying out at least 3 inferior models of batting tees, I finally caved and purchased the original Tanner Tee. There is simply no comparison--this IS what you should get. Sturdy, the easiest thing to assemble and simply to adjust the height. I would only buy a Tanner tee from here on out IF I even need to replace this--and that is doubtful for how well it's made.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wolgin

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment in your Team or Child
customer_reviews.text: This is truly one of the best baseball and t-ball practice tools that you can buy! You need to buy this for your child to practice at home with waffle balls or real baseballs. If your a coach, you can't go wrong with this one! Lasts many seasons and is one of the best tee's out there today. Built by a baseball coach for coaches and interactive parents.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great but, but prefer the Jugs.
customer_reviews.text: Great tee, but prefer the Jugs tee. This goes higher which is only good for slowpitch practice. The Jugs tee has a handle on it which makes it easier to carry. Overall good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Asay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Head Baseball Coach at the HS where I teach recommended this tee for my son and I’m glad I took his advice. It is extremely sturdy at the base and feels like it will last a long time. My son (4yr old) has already missed on a few swings yet it still feels like it won’t break or warp. I highly recommend this tee if you’re looking to buy something not outrageously priced for the quality you will get. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee
customer_reviews.text: Invested in the tanner tee because I coach my sons little league team. It's by far the best one I have yet. Finally decided it was time to invest in a good tee. Glad I went with Tanner. Had hear it was a really great brand and IT IS!! Its very durable to hits and easily assembled. Literally you screw on the bottom to the top and its done! Can easily adjust it up and down if needed by pulling on the tee up or down. Will definitely buy Tanner products from now on!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee for Any Age
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite tee when I played in high school and I figured I would make the investment now for my 7 year old. He isn't as precise with his swings yet and most tees fell over on almost every swing. This tee is much more sturdy and he doesn't have to spend as much time picking the tee up which makes hitting a more enjoyable experience for him. He has hit all parts of the tee and there is no damage at all. Great tee!
customer_reviews.author: Ben H.

customer_reviews.title: Like butta!
customer_reviews.text: Hitting off this tee is soooo different then hitting off the tees I had as a kid. Hitting off this tee is like a hot knife through room temp butter vs the older tees which are like a dull butter knife through butter just out of the fridge. It will also save you from picking it up constantly if your kid hits to far under the ball (assuming he doesn’t hit the metal bar or just above).
customer_reviews.author: MrOBs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my now 13 y/o son about a year ago. I was then apprehensive of the price but it’s durability every cent. It is used 3-5x per week for about an hour each bout during fairer weather. My son does his best to maintain it, put it away, and not hit the rubber tip, which is the goal anyway. If he hits the rubber tip, there is a bounce back for feedback to correct his position.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great tee
customer_reviews.text: This tee works well, and compared to the old rubber tube tees this one is a godsend. We’ve only had the tee for about a month now, but we’ve had no issues. The base is heavy and keeps the tee upright, yet it’s light enough for my young daughters to move it. I would definitely recommend. It costs about the same as two of the old style tees, but eliminates a lot of the frustration we had with those tees. It’s worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality. A whole season of use by the entire baseball team at every practice and by my son at home and it is still looking new. The weight is a little light out of the box and tips easier than I wanted. I might add some weights next year to stabilize it a little better. I paired this with the power net and it was a nice combo.
customer_reviews.author: MuffinMan

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These are as good as you know them to be. If you're comparing the price of these vs some of the cheaper ones, consider that you WILL break 2-3 of the cheaper tees over the course of a couple years, where this one will last you many years past that. If you can afford the cost up front you will save yourself money over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good tee.  Could be heavier.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tee but seemed a little expense. Only negative so far after using it a few times is that it falls over once in a while if you hit too low on the tee. Base is not heavy enough but I guess that’s how they get you to spend more money and buy the weight for the base. Does seem to be one of the best options out their for tees.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality batting tee made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality batting tee made in USA. Has a weighted base to keep it in place on the ground, plus a telescoping shaft enabling easy height adjustment. The top is custom-wound and hopefully durable - I've only had it for a week, too short to tell how well it will last. Can say it has not immediately become damaged from the few times so far I've smashed the top with a swing that was too low. How much can you really say about a batting tee? Maybe not much, it's a pretty basic product. But this one is good quality, and glad to see a good U.S. made baseball-related product.
customer_reviews.author: Mercurial

customer_reviews.title: The Best Batting Tee
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is by far the best batting tee on the market right now. So well made and sturdy, I can't believe I didn't buy one years ago. It comes apart so it's easy to transport to/from games, practice, etc. If you are still using the old rubber tee, you must invest in the Tanner Tee!!
customer_reviews.author: MBaroni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tee!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it might topple because the base is pretty light weight but so far so good! Since softball is cancelled due to C-19 we’ve been getting together with a few of of my 13 year old daughters teammates to practice and there have been no issues. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jul&Bill

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with another tee
customer_reviews.text: Tanner has it figured out. The top rubber piece doesn't intrude on the swing and gives true swing results. Small enough for easy travel to and from practice. We've used it every day since i bought it and it kicks butt. Buy it if you or your kid loves baseball and is eager to practice.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good tee.  Recommend getting it weighted..
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust height. Bottom isnt weighted so it will tip right over if you miss the top. It tends to move on you after a few hits. My 11 year old hit about 30 baseballs off it and I had to reposition it three different times.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tee!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice baseball/softball tee. It was recommended to us as being much better quality than most so we bought it for our son in law and grandson. They love it so well worth the additional cost! Our son in law coaches three different teams and he said there is no comparison in his mind!
customer_reviews.author: Maltby

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, works well. Holds up to practice with my son. He's almost 8 and takes it out to bat at least 5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Durable and quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s been the tee I’ve needed for years. It’s a bit pricey, but the quality is worth the price tag along. My son has taken hundreds of cuts off of the tee and it still looks like it has barely been used. Quality product and I’d buy another if I ever needed one. I highly recommend this product to anyone serious about training.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael Rosse

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, durable
customer_reviews.text: This tee is very well made! I was getting really tired of buying cheap tee after cheap tee after they'd break so easily. I think the Tanner Tee will prove to be well-worth the money. My son was THRILLED with this tee and immediately took it outside and hit a bucket. So far, 100 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Quality built yet simple product that provides excellent feel off the bat when hitting the ball. Breaks down in seconds if you want to pack it up for travel. You can spend less or you can spend a lot more on a similar product but the Tanner Tee is exactly what we were looking for. We have seen this tee used from youth baseball up to the pros and after using it can see why it’s so popular at all levels.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: The best you can get!
customer_reviews.text: No better tee on the market. Incredibly durable and has a sturdy base that stays upright no matter how hard you hit the ball. My son has hit thousands of balls off this tee and it looks just as good as the day we got it. Don't go for the cheaper alternatives or you'll be replacing it every season.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Pay Up For Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son used lower priced rubber tees since t-ball until ours started to bend and warp from use and weathering. We used Tanner Tees during indoor cage work, so when it came time to get a new tee, I decided to buy this model. It's like night and day. If your child is serious about hitting and is dedicated to tee work, pay up for quality and get this tee. You, and your child, will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Tripp M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing similar to it in this category is the one made by Bownet. The Bownet's design is a bit gimmicky. So we went with this one like many kids in our neighborhood did. They all seem pretty happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: QQZJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tee
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my high school softball players. Had the older version of the tanner tee and loved it. This one is even better. All other tees we tried always had problems with the top or easily falling over. I am going to be only purchasing the tanner tee from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Just a great product with many years of use.
customer_reviews.text: Great tee, owned it over 3 years gets plenty of use and abuse by 12-16u kids and works as good as new. While more expensive than many you won’t have to replace it for years to come. Also don’t wait around for it to come down in price, go ahead and buy it today because the price seems to be one of the most consistent for any product.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good...
customer_reviews.text: In addition to cage work, I haul it to the games for warming up. It is a convenient size and weight for that. It seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave in rain
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tees out there. Just for serious ball play otherwise save some money
customer_reviews.author: sahmom

customer_reviews.title: Very happy w/ this tee
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new tee, so I did some homework before buying this tee... This tee is so much better than the old rubber tube type tees we've had in the past. It's light enough where my kids can move it and use it, but sturdy enough to not fall over if they mis-hit the ball. Very satisfied with this tee.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty batting tee
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but well-built, most of the teams use these because they're easily repaired and last a long time. Excellent for home batting practice, lasted much longer than cheaper versions/imitators.
customer_reviews.author: Act162This

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tee for adults - get the short one for kids under 12
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tee. High quality, and I'm sure it will last forever. Excellent height range for adults, but if you coach little league or other youth baseball, get the shorter version. This one doesn't go below belt-high for my 10 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Sent refurbished part though
customer_reviews.text: I am please with the product as it stands up well to use and it is durable. The only reason I give it four stars is that the metal base had pretty considerable cosmetic damage like it had been used quite a bit. I think I was sent a refurbished part. It doesn’t take away from the performance of the product but it was deceiving because I thought I was getting a brand new product. Great product, I’m just not extremely happy with the condition in which I received the metal base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a decent tee
customer_reviews.text: We had the other plastic/rubber tees for my son through little league and they just did not last. Got this one when he started playing 13U and this one is a whole new level of construction. Works great, easy to adjust, and worth the money if your kid plays seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Whyme?

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and so does my kid!
customer_reviews.text: Great tees. Often imitated but the quality of Tanner Tees sets it apart from the rest. The only future improvement I would ask for (if anyone at Tanner is interested) is some type of stability feature for when we are practicing in the grass. Tee often falls over when younger players are first getting started. Other than that, I wouldn’t change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS WOLF

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable enough for low strikes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but it doesn’t go low enough. Even for an adult if you want practice hitting a ball at your knees you can’t quite do that. For my 9 year old son the lowest it goes is mid thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Tron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight to train- will sustain a hit to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used by the whole little league team. Well made. Perfect weight to train- will sustain a hit to the rubber but will fall over if they swing too low. Easy enough for me to carry to and from practices. . Adjustable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great tee
customer_reviews.text: These are exelent tees. We have 4 in our barn for batting lessons and several at the school my wife coaches at. The baseball and softball coaches all prefer these to others and fight over who gets them.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Best T
customer_reviews.text: Anything cheaper will not make you happy. This not the case with most products but I have tried 3 different cheaper tees and been disappointed. This is the best. Oil the threads when you screw base in . Great product.
customer_reviews.author: reid

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you get what you pay for. This was not cheap, but it is not made cheap either. very solidly built, should hold up to the abuse it will get. I like the adjustable heights and it's easy to put together. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: A giant among the contenders.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tee after seeing 10 of them at our local indoor training facility. My son is 12 and hits 100's of baseballs a month off of a tee, the Franklin brand we had only lasted a few months before breaking. This one is definitely worth the little extra money. I don't plan on buyng another tee for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: #gocreateTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Do it, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Unmatched Quality! I bought this after having gone through a pile of cheap ones. I unexpectedly saw a large jump in the learning curve with my kids! They became much more proficient at there swing to hit ratio. The adjustable height is also a huge benefit. It allows the tee to grow with the kids, and also allows other people including adults to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: "A Must Have"
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well constructed tool. My son does baseball practically year around. I could not begin to count the number of baseballs that has been hit off of his Tanner tee, not to mention his baseball team. He is 14 years old now, and I could see him using this tee all the way through college. One thing that makes this tee so nice, is how easily it can be transferred from a high pitch to a low pitch, or vice versa, making it really easy to get more swings in. I consider this to be a "must have" when it comes to baseball equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Tee for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the tee to replace the cheap on I've had from Franklin for the last 3 years. The hight adjustment is great and extremely durable (now that my kid is swinging harder). Must buy if your player is serious.
customer_reviews.author: Kshow42

customer_reviews.title: You should buy it if you want a quality tee
customer_reviews.text: They are an amazing company. The make there design so strong and have had them at are facility for 4 years not one had broke. They are perfect for a gift. Have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TAnn

customer_reviews.title: Quality tee
customer_reviews.text: My son is using this in combination with the Rukket Sports 7 x 7 Baseball & Softball Practice Net with Bow Frame to practice hitting this off-season. Tee works great; very pleased with it so far. Very portable (obviously) and adjustable and holds the adjusted height well. Flextop works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: EBR

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday.  Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t think they make a better baseball Tee. We had a cheaper one that wasn’t that great and didn’t last very long. This is the real deal just like the pros.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tee
customer_reviews.text: Prices is high but when you have it infront of you, worth the invest. My adviced if you investing on your kids do it thinking on the future and could be use for to years to come and not for the moment. Recommend this Tee
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rodz

customer_reviews.title: ... tee with the PowerNet DLX 7X7 and what a great deal I got for both the tee and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tee with the PowerNet DLX 7X7 and what a great deal I got for both the tee and the training net. The Tee is very well made and sturdy. It's also very easy to assemble and disassemble. All you have to do is screw in the tee shaft into the base and then adjust to the desired height. The part that holds the ball is awesome too. True to the description that it holds the balls in a manner that you get a true hit on the balls I highly recommend this tee to anyone who's looking to improve their hitting skills...baseball or softball alike.
customer_reviews.author: Lioness2021

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my other tee broke and since i’m in quarantine, i’m practicing softball a lot of the time. with this tee i don’t need my parents or someone to toss the ball up to me every time. the tee is easy to adjust if needed and it’s not very heavy either. best tee i’ve ever used i think.
customer_reviews.author: James Graham

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband is pleased. He played ball from grade school through college and wanted this tee to play around on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go with the original; it makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a cheaper one - should have just gotten this one the first time. Stands up to two kids practicing hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago burbs mom

customer_reviews.title: Best tee ever
customer_reviews.text: Have owned for at least 4 years my son is a junior in high school and he uses it all the time he loves it buy a weight for it and it stays up right even if you miss
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Tanner Tees what else is there?
customer_reviews.text: great product. Same tees used at majority of the HS and Colleges and Pros! A definitely great investment! Would buy them over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lopez

customer_reviews.title: my son loves this tee
customer_reviews.text: works great. Lots of hits so far with no issues
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It's a Tanner Tee!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is the second one that I have purchased. It has put up with so much activity and use. I love this tee. My son has used one since he was 8 he is now 15 and still using one everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Alton Brock

customer_reviews.title: Big step up from the others
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel, hand wrapped ball holder is enough to make it worth an extra few bucks. This is the kind of product you can buy once and never need another. Unfortunately I didn't figure that out until after is spent $20 three times cheaper tees. Spend the money once and save in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Peffinger

customer_reviews.title: HR tee derby or bust
customer_reviews.text: Tee is fairly durable. Hit it a few times fill tilt and it didn't break. The cup at the top needs to be replaced but one could consider that standard maintenance. (500+ swings a week all summer)
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee
customer_reviews.text: This tee has totally held up nicely in our home. It is in the back yard and my children use it daily. Still, after a year of daily use, it's held up without any major damage.
customer_reviews.author: OM

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but expensive for what it does.
customer_reviews.text: It holds a ball for someone to hit. It does what it’s supposed to do, but for the life of me I can’t figure out why it’s so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Miller

customer_reviews.title: great practice tee
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old grandson uses it to practice every day. He is not only the best pitcher on his team, but is "called up" to play on different teams nearly every single week (even with the older boys). His father tells me that this is an excellent tool for him.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have 6 of these tees. Durable and easy to travel with. I will always buy tanner tees.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and packs and travels easily due to its compact ...
customer_reviews.text: Tee is worth the cost. Sturdy and packs and travels easily due to its compact size. If you're going to be traveling and setting up multiple T's, this one is nice to have. You can pack 3 or 4 in a single bucket or sunflower seed case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Boys say it is much better than their ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Boys say it is much better than their old tee but this Ohio weather has been ridiculous this year so haven't gotten much time outside to use it. SUPER sturdy and heavy and I'm pretty sure this will be the last tee I have to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aeolous

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable tee. Don't buy a cheap one and have to replace it later. We hit off this daily and it is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Scoonie22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little league to 12 U
customer_reviews.text: Works well, after beating still works great but with some aggressive usage is starting to break down. Remember... you HIT this over and over again. Some harder than others
customer_reviews.author: James Finn

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for keeping hitting skills sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson, a real baseball slugger. He added a 10 pound weight to the base. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great tee
customer_reviews.text: Love this tee. Light weight and the height is adjustable. The height is great at its tallest for my daughter to work on staying high and working her way down. Perfect for working rise balls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita F. Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and easily adjusted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tee for the backyard for my 12 & 10 year old boys. They love it! Easy to put together and easy to adjust to different heights. Sturdy enough to stay in place when they swing and rubber at the top is forgiving when they miss the ball and lightweight enough for them to move around the yard. Bought with a net so they didn't have to chase the ball around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Niele

customer_reviews.title: Best T for serious players
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line baseball T for adults or youth. Construction is exceptional and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Noel P. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Best Tee!
customer_reviews.text: We have been needing a new tee for awhile and this is the perfect one!!! Very durable and sturdy! Not to heavy and super easy to disassemble and assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Langley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tee. It's made of sturdy materials. I play adult men's softball so I've been using it to work on my swing. It can hold a regular size men's softball with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Wes in Fort Mill, SC

customer_reviews.title: Best tee money can buy
customer_reviews.text: We've put some work on this tee and it's still going strong. Unless the swing is real bad, this tee keeps itself upright with it's solid base.
customer_reviews.author: TheQ Fam

customer_reviews.title: Great Tee for any age.
customer_reviews.text: Tanner Tee is one of the best Tees I’ve have ever used and I’ve been paying baseball for over 20 years. Great for any age my son Tee-ball team uses it as well for me as an adult. Durable and easy to carry to and from practice. I would highly recommend this tee for any baseball age.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great Batting Tee
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it during his batting practice and it has held up well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: CDF3

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. This is the same T you'll find a good baseball facility. Extends quite high and low compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer The Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry, easy to adjust, does not tip over unless hit directly. Please with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dean L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easily adjusts heights but doesn't fall on its own. Good training tee. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: T May

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Would buy again 10/10 times
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Would buy again 10/10 times. Great quality and great adjustability. My 7 and 8 year olds both use it and will use it until they're adults. I might even take a few swings myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ball rest is great as it provides very little resistance so you get ...
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive, but it is so worth the money. They are virtually indestructible. The ball rest is great as it provides very little resistance so you get more feedback on contact. Rock solid and never falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cranford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Tanner tee is great quality. Nice that the base can be removed for transport. A little spendy compared to others but it's worth the quality. Used for adult amateur and children as well.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Best Batting Tee in the business
customer_reviews.text: Best tee in the business. It is hard to say anything negative about the Tanner tee. It was developed by an actual baseball player not an engineer. He got it right!
customer_reviews.author: Sterzy

customer_reviews.title: Quality tee for youth baseball
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tee that is easy to carry, easy to adjust, and seems pretty sturdy. Much better than the Easton tees we had been using.
customer_reviews.author: Home office

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality; not your rec center quality. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tee
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tee made a quality materials perfect for my seven-year-old who hits really hard
customer_reviews.author: jnel

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect training tool. Will work for many seasons and lots of kids swinging!
customer_reviews.author: zac

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy  plastic base....
customer_reviews.text: base is a plastic material and not a steel or metal plate will fall over when batter misses the ball ans hits the rubber holder... not sturdy at all good for practice but not for game use...
customer_reviews.author: M.Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! One of the best tees you can buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best durable tees on the market. I bought 5 of these for our softball teams. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: OZ

product_meta.title: TANNER TEE the ORIGINAL | Premium Baseball/Softball Batting Tee w/ Tanner Original Base, Patented Hand-rolled FlexTop, and Easy Height Adjustments for Ages 9 & up, Metal/Black, Adjustable Height: 26" - 43" (TT001)
product_meta.description:
The Tanner Tee (Adult/Standard Adjustable 26-43 inch) is our most popular and universal Tanner batting tee, comprised of two parts, an adjustable metal stem and a nine-inch weather resistant base. This is a top seller, backed by quality, unsolicited reviews from Tanner Tee customers. Our tees are used by all levels of professional baseball, top college and high school programs, and thousands of home hitters. 
The FlexTop ball rest is a tightly wound durable cone and allows your bat to pass through the contact point with the least interference, which means bats are not damaged by rigid tee tops and most importantly feedback off the tee is true. 
There are similar tees at various price points and features. You can pay less for a plastic version of a Tanner Tee, but remember a metal bat will contact your batting tee with velocity - quality parts and workmanship matters! Our founder Joe Tanner invented the adjustable rolled-rubber batting tee 30 years ago, and we proudly stand behind every Tanner Tee we build. Every tee is built and quality controlled by the same family that's been doing it for 25 years.
